General.Name: Wuxi Huaguang Boiler Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells equipment in the field of energy and environmental protection. The company offers circulating fluidized bed boilers, pulverized coal boilers, waste incineration boilers, biomass boilers, gas waste heat boilers, and desulfurization and denitrification environmental equipment. It also engages in the investment, construction, and operation of coal-fired, gas-fired, geothermal, waste heat, and other thermal power enterprises; design of power station; general contracting of engineering construction and flue gas treatment; professional design in the field of municipal environment, and disposal of solid waste; and other businesses, as well as operation of photovoltaic power stations. In addition, the company involved in power station engineering installation; waste incineration power generation; heat supply; sludge treatment; and gas power generation. Further, it provides town heating, environmental protection engineering, and new energy technical services. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Huaguang Boiler Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co., Ltd. in June 2020. Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Wen Jun  Zhong
